name: festival
description: *** ### ***Description*** The festival App allows edm lovers to get together and share upcoing evebnts on thier feed. Users are also able to search Dj's and add them to thier favorites.  ### ***Technologies Used*** * CSS Grid * Event listeners     * Load event     * Click event * React ### ***Getting Started*** ##### We first set up the server for festival posts and comments. Have the back end set up and have post show on the home page. ##### A Trello board was used to keep track of the development progress and can be viewed [here.](https://trello.com/b/FK3A3yi5/festival) ### ***Screenshots*** ##### Electric Festival
